FindSolarPanelsAdjust: Finding and adjusting all Solar Panels. (This may take some time)
FindBatteriesAdjust: Finding and adjusting all Batteries. (This may take some time)
FindSolarPanelsRevert: Finding and reverting all Solar Panels. (This may take some time)
FindBatteriesRevert: Finding and reverting all Batteries. (This may take some time)
ConfigUpdateOrFix: Configuration file is corrupt (or doesn't exists), creating new one!
